issue.title: Remove extraction file upload
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

The upload of a file specifically for extraction is useless. I propose to remove it.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TP has to check with easySDI users if noone used this functionnlaty.
If it's the case, TC is OK with the removal.
